articles.title: Milan player Brignone is still extraordinary! He wins his second Olympic gold in the Cortina Giant
articles.summary: With another extraordinary performance, AC Milan player Federica Brignone won her second Olympic gold at the 2026 Milan-Cortina Games with a time of 2'13"50 in the Giant held at the Olympia delle Tofane in Cortina.
